ANNOUNCEMENT - Shortly before lunchtime today, 1/9/2020, our lockdown system was initiated at Napoleon High School. There was NO incident but we feel an explanation is in order.

Over the break, during regularly scheduled cleaning, a disc floor polisher damaged one of the units causing the sensor to initiate. At that time, that particular box in a restroom was manually turned off. Before the unit could be repaired, someone inadvertently turned that unit back on at some point. It may have been bumped with regular traffic causing the system sensor to initiate lockdown.

That box has been manually turned off and is slated for repair services soon.

We apologize for the concern this may have caused anyone. Our staff and students did a fantastic job of going into lockdown and being patient as the situation was dealt with. Again, everyone was safe and there was no emergency situation.

*AN ALL CALL IS ALSO PROCESSING AT THIS TIME TO NOTIFY PARENTS. Thank you for your patience.
